biography.summary: Amy Jean Klobuchar is an American attorney and politician serving as the senior United States Senator from Minnesota. A member of the Democratic Party, she has chaired the Senate Democratic Steering Committee and has focused on antitrust, consumer protection, agriculture, and criminal justice reform.
biography.education: Bachelor of Arts from Yale University; Juris Doctor from the University of Chicago Law School.
biography.career: Klobuchar previously served as a prosecutor and the Hennepin County Attorney (Minnesota), before being elected to the U.S. Senate in 2006.

contact.office_address: 425 Dirksen Senate Office Building, Washington, DC 20510
